body_content.explanation: short for Staffordshire bull terrier: a type of small to medium-size terrier (= a dog that chases small animals in and out of holes) from England that is related to the bulldog, has a strong body and a short coat of fur, and was once used to fight other dogs:
examples: Some people confuse Staffies and Pit Bull Terriers.
Different staffies have different temperaments, just like all dogs.
